body_html:
BTW, I'm seeing possibly related bug in #9234 the difference is that it happens in float32, and sometimes produces segfaults instead of NaNs

The matrix in question is in https://storage.googleapis.com/tensorflow-community-wheels/svd_in and and can be opened as
matrix0 = np.genfromtxt('svd_in', delimiter= ",").astype(dtype)
body_text:
BTW, I'm seeing possibly related bug in #9234 the difference is that it happens in float32, and sometimes produces segfaults instead of NaNs
The matrix in question is in https://storage.googleapis.com/tensorflow-community-wheels/svd_in and and can be opened as
matrix0 = np.genfromtxt('svd_in', delimiter= ",").astype(dtype)
body:
BTW, I'm seeing possibly related bug in https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/9234 the difference is that it happens in float32, and sometimes produces segfaults instead of NaNs

The matrix in question is in https://storage.googleapis.com/tensorflow-community-wheels/svd_in and and can be opened as 
`matrix0 = np.genfromtxt('svd_in', delimiter= ",").astype(dtype)
`
